##Look to see tails for cutoffs
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#ITS2
```{r}
ITS2 <- read_csv("data/updated_ITS2_reads_WeeTu.csv")

ITS2_common_species <- ITS2 %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(total_reads = sum(Reads)) %>%  
  filter(total_reads > 51000)

ITS2_common_genus <- ITS2 %>% 
  group_by(Genus) %>% 
  summarise(total_reads = sum(Reads)) %>%  
  filter(total_reads > 69000)

```


#trnL

```{r}
trnL <- read_csv("data/updated_trnL_reads_WeeTu.csv")

trnL_common_species <- trnL %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(total_reads = sum(Reads)) %>%

trnL_common_genus <- trnL %>% 
  group_by(Genus) %>% 
  summarise(total_reads = sum(Reads)) %>%

```
